translations: v．尊敬，敬重：尊重并认为某人或某事具有很高的价值。
· She esteems her teacher very highly.

sentences.sentence: He esteems himself to be lucky.
No one esteems your father more than I do.
sentences.translation: 没有人比我更尊敬你的父亲了。

sentences.sentence: The teacher esteems it clever to write everything down in the notebook.
sentences.translation: 老师认为在笔记本上写下所有东西是聪明的。
